H0.text: Practicing space walking had to be planned for because muscles and bones need physical stress to remain healthy during manned space flights.

H1.text: Counseling activities for tension had to be planned for to ensure muscles and bones receive the necessary physical stress during manned space flights.

H2.text: Exercising to maintain strength had to be planned for because scientists noted that muscles and bones would need physical stress to remain healthy during manned space flights.

H3.text: Monitoring circadian rhythms had to be planned for during manned space flights because scientists noted that muscles and bones would need physical stress to remain healthy.
